articles.description: The firm was kicked off the New York Stock Exchange due to rules imposed by Donald Trump.
articles.content:
Image source, Getty Images
China Mobile, the world's largest mobile network operator, aims to raise as much as $8.8bn (£6.7bn) when it lists its shares in Shanghai.
The company was kicked off the N… [+1781 chars]
